testcase.classname: As a user, I should be able to access the "Online Exam" page and make changes and view the Exam details When entering the Student Panel
testcase.name: The user should be able to access and see the column fields in the ""Online Exam"" section, ""Exam View"" from the Action section.
testcase.system-out: Given The user goes to the "loginUrl" address...............................passed When The user clicks on the student login tab...............................passed And The user navigates to a new page that opens in the browser..............passed Then The user verifies that username texbox, password texbox and Sign In button are visible on the opened page.passed And The user enters "studentUsername_dgn" into the username textbox.........passed And The user enters "password_dgn" into the password textbox................passed When The user clicks the Sign In button and goes to the student page........passed And The use clicks Onleine Exam tab.........................................passed When The user sees the Upcoming Exam and Closed Exam columns on the page that opens..passed And The user clicks on the view link of the first exam under the Action column..passed Then The user verifies on the quiz title visible on the page that opens.....passed And User closes the page....................................................passed

testcase.classname: As a user, I should be able to access the "Online Exam" page and make changes and view the Exam details When entering the Student Panel
testcase.name: The user enters the ""Closed Exam"" section, they should be able to see the column fields and
testcase.system-out: Given The user goes to the "loginUrl" address...............................passed When The user clicks on the student login tab...............................passed And The user navigates to a new page that opens in the browser..............passed Then The user verifies that username texbox, password texbox and Sign In button are visible on the opened page.passed And The user enters "studentUsername_dgn" into the username textbox.........passed And The user enters "password_dgn" into the password textbox................passed When The user clicks the Sign In button and goes to the student page........passed And The use clicks Onleine Exam tab.........................................passed When User clicks on Closed Exam button......................................passed Then The user verifies the visibility of Exam, Quiz, Date From, Date To, Duration, Total Attempt , Attempted, Status, Action titles on the page.passed And User closes the page....................................................passed
